sourcesContent:
<template>
  Home
</template>

<script>

import {inject, onMounted, ref, watch} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "Home",
  setup(props){
    onMounted(()=>{
      const mqttClient = inject('mqttClient')
      let mqtt = ref(null)

      mqttClient
          .then((client) => {
            client.on('connect', ()=> {
              mqtt = client

              console.log(mqtt)
              //subscribe('test')
            })

          })
          .catch((err) => {
            console.log(err)
          });

      watch(mqtt, (newVal, oldVal)=> {

        console.log("connected: "+ mqtt.connected)
      })

    })






  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
